snippet: Music of Now Marathon at Symphony Space was the kick-off to the third annual Composers Now Festival, which runs through Feb. 28.
abstract: Steve Smith reviews the Music of Now Marathon concert at Symphony Space, which kicks off the third annual Composers Now Festival.
lead_paragraph: Music of Now Marathon at Symphony Space was the kick-off to the third annual Composers Now Festival, which runs through Feb. 28.

headline.seo: Fernando Otero in Music of Now Marathon at Symphony Space
headline.main: Marathon With Room for Art Songs and Electronics
